Frequently Asked Questions

Do you offer catering services?

Yes, we provide full catering services for events of all sizes. Our catering menu features our most popular dishes and can be customized to meet your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your event requirements.

What are your hours of operation?

We're open Tuesday through Sunday from 11:00 AM to 10:00 PM. We're closed on Mondays for kitchen prep and staff training. Holiday hours may vary - please call ahead to confirm.

Authentic Japanese Cuisine at Rivers Avenue

Welcome to Light Of Tokyo Rivers Ave, your go-to destination for authentic Japanese cuisine in North Charleston. Enjoy our exquisite sushi, hibachi, and dine-in atmosphere, or opt for convenient takeout and delivery services.
Order Now 
Order Your Favorite Sushi Online in Charleston

At Light Of Tokyo Rivers Ave, savor authentic Japanese cuisine with the convenience of online ordering. Enjoy seamless delivery or takeout right here in North Charleston, allowing you to relish our delicious dishes from the comfort of your home.
Order Now 
LaSandra Jennings
This is the best place to eat, the chicken is delicious and seasoned wonderfully. ü•∞‚ù£Ô∏èü•∞The sauces are awesome!! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠êI love the spicy white sauce, and the ginger for my vegetable. They do have the regular white sauce but I fell in love with the spicy one. ü•∞‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞ This is a great option for affordable, delicious eating!!
